title: Tahm Question
body:
to those testing him right now on the pbe i was wondering about his bite where you can eat someone. can you eat someone then zonyas and if so will it prolong the time someone is in your belly and if you have someone in you belly about to come out and bard uses his ult since the person in your belly cant be targeted will they still come out?.


i know if you swallow someone kalista has bonded with she can pull them out of his belly
